catalog.college: College of Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics (CSTEM)

source.notes: Official course data comes from the EWU catalog. Use the search deep link as the canonical per-course URL. Avoid relying on in-page anchors, which are not stable.

courses.title: INTRODUCTION TO PROGRAMMING
courses.description_summary: Intro to programming concepts, control structures, I/O, and debugging; hands-on projects.

courses.title: EXPERIMENTAL COURSE
courses.description_summary: Variable topic offering for new or trial content.

courses.title: DIRECTED STUDY
courses.prerequisites: Permission of instructor, department chair and college dean.
courses.description_summary: Independent study arranged with faculty oversight.
